Header.paragraph: Welcome to V.A.N.T.A (Value-Added Network Targeting Audiences)

About.paragraph: VANTA consulting is a precision marketing firm that helps growing businesses and start-ups build and scale their online presence. Their team specializes in targeted advertising, lead generation, and client acquisition to increase online visibility and ultimately generate more business.

Services.name: Website design and management
Services.text: VANTA consulting offers website design and management services to ensure that a business's website is visually appealing, user-friendly, and easy to navigate. They offer various pricing options ranging from $15 to $200 per month.

Services.name: Email marketing services
Services.text: We offer email marketing services that help businesses reach out to their customers and clients through targeted email campaigns. They offer different pricing options ranging from $10 to $50 per month or around $0.5 per email.

Services.name: Social media marketing
Services.text: We help businesses build their social media presence through targeted social media marketing campaigns. They offer various pricing options ranging from $5 to $50 per month.

Services.name: Search engine optimization
Services.text: We offer search engine optimization services to help businesses rank higher in search engine results pages. Our pricing ranges from $20 to $200+ per month.

Services.name: Pay-per-click advertisement
Services.text: VANTA consulting offers pay-per-click advertising services, where businesses pay only when a user clicks on their ad. We charge around 12% of the total ad spend.

Services.name: Copywriting and lead generation
Services.text: We offer copywriting and lead generation services to help businesses generate more leads and ultimately drive more sales.Our pricing ranges from $10 to $160 per month.
